text: The flag of Benito Juárez () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. It's the civil flag of Cancún city. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code White #FFFFFF ==Related pages== * Cancún ==References== Benito Juárez Benito Juárez Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Benito Juárez, Quintana Roo
